creditline: Gift of Mrs. Howard Mansfield in memory of her mother, Anna Coolidge Todd; to whom the shawl belonged
description: Shawl, black chantilly, thread lace, triangular shape, with border composed of sprays of palmetto leaves and chrysanthemums. Above the border are geometric shapes containing chrysanthemums; the ground is filled with lilies and lilies of the valley in sprays. Small hole in center.
title: Shawl
